name: ShapeCollection
description: Represents all the shapes in the worksheet.

methods.name: getItem
methods.description: Returns a shape identified by the shape id. Read-only.

methods.name: getCount
methods.description: Returns the number of shapes in the worksheet. Read-only.

methods.name: addImage
methods.description: Creates an image from a base64 string and adds it to worksheet. Returns the image object that represents the new Image.

parameters.name: base64ImageString
parameters.description: A base64 encoded image in JPEG or PNG formats.

methods.name: addGeometricShape
methods.description: Adds a geometric shape to worksheet. Returns a Shape object that represents the new shape.
methods.signature: addGeometricShape(geometricShapeType: string, left: double, top: double, width: double, height: double)

parameters.name: geometricShapeType
parameters.description: Represents the geometric type of the shape.

parameters.name: left
parameters.description: The distance, in points, from the left side of the shape to the left side of the worksheet.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: The distance, in points, from the top edge of the shape to the top of the worksheet.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The width, in points, of the shape.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height, in points, of the shape.

methods.name: addTextBox
methods.description: Adds a textbox to worksheet by telling it's text content. Returns a Shape object that represents the new text box.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Represents the text that will be shown in the created text box.
